EMBEDDED_RELEASED.description: Indicates if an embedded app is available to play.

MANAGED_EMOJI.description: Indicates if the app has the ability to create Twitch-style emojis.

GROUP_DM_CREATE.description: Indicates if the app has permission to create group DMs.

RPC_PRIVATE_BETA.description: Allows the application to access the local RPC server

ALLOW_ASSETS.description: Allows the application to create activity assets

ALLOW_ACTIVITY_ACTION_SPECTATE.description: Allows the application to enable activity spectating

ALLOW_ACTIVITY_ACTION_JOIN_REQUEST.description: Allows the application to enable join requests for activities

GATEWAY_PRESENCE.description: Intent required for bots in 100 or more servers to receive presence_update events.

GATEWAY_PRESENCE_LIMITED.description: Intent required for bots in under 100 servers to receive presence_update events.

GATEWAY_GUILD_MEMBERS.description: Intent required for bots in 100 or more servers to receive member-related events like guild_member_add.

GATEWAY_GUILD_MEMBERS_LIMITED.description: Intent required for bots in under 100 servers to receive member-related events like guild_member_add.

VERIFICATION_PENDING_GUILD_LIMIT.description: Indicates unusual growth of an app that prevents verification.

EMBEDDED.description: Indicates if an app is embedded within the Discord client.

GATEWAY_MESSAGE_CONTENT.description: Intent required for bots in 100 or more servers to receive message content.

GATEWAY_MESSAGE_CONTENT_LIMITED.description: Intent required for bots in under 100 servers to receive message content.

APPLICATION_COMMAND_BADGE.description: Indicates if an app has registered global application commands.
